name: Nonogram - griddler puzzles
description:
Challenge your logic skills and try solving the popular Nonogram puzzles to see what’s hidden in the pictures. The game is very addictive and satisfying. We promise you’ll enjoy every minute of your screen time!

Nonograms are also known as griddlers, Japanese crosswords, and cryptopics. Figure out which boxes to fill to reveal black & white or color pics. It’s easy to understand how to solve the puzzles, but hard to stop solving them.

Features:
- Black and white or color griddlers;
- 3 difficulty levels;
- Never-ending new content;
- Hints and extra lives.

Try now!
